title: Lamb tagine with herbed couscous
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon ground paprika', '1 teaspoon ground saffron', 'oil for frying', '100g diced lamb', '1 onion, chopped', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 cinammon stick', '100g couscous', '1 splash lemon juice', '1 to 2 handfuls fresh chopped herbs (parsley, mint, etc.)', 'Greek yoghurt, to serve', '1 sprig parsley, to serve']
